name: Routine (itch) (KimKillaQueen)
description:
A wip game about spending time in your apartment during a quarantine. 

Currently only a studio apartment with a couple interactables like doors, light switches, and a drawer!

The game will be separated by 18-hour days, where each day is roughly 6-7 minutes in realtime, and involve doing various tasks throughout the day.

CONTROLS:

    WASD: movement
    F: interact
